page.title: 16RECREATION STOKE ON TERN
page.content:
{THE SPORTS HANGAR}
One of the disused aircraft hangars on the Tern Hill airfield has been converted into a Sports Centre. It has facilities for a variety of sports. There are two five-a-side football pitches and four badminton courts. Also there is a trampoline for gymnastics practice, an area for indoor hockey, and ranges for both rifle and archery target practice. Quite a lot of the equipment needed can be hired in the centre. Expert staff is available to give instruction. One of the latest additions that the children enjoy is the roller skating. For this you need to wear a pair of special boots. Small wheels are attached to the soles of the boots. These allow you to travel at speed.
